titles: The crown of righteousness. Set forth in a sermon preached at Stephens Walbrook, May 1. 1656. At the funeral of Thomas Hodges Esquire. / By Thomas Watson, minister of Stephens Walbrook, in the citie of London.
author: Watson, Thomas, d. 1686.
publisher: Printed for Joseph Crawford, at the signe of the Kings Head in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: With a preliminary imprimatur leaf; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Hodges, Thomas, d. 1656 --  Early works to 1800.
